remarks: A special version of class substitution commonly used for structures. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Mar-2019.)
statement:
sbcies.a $e |- A = ( E ` W ) $.
sbcies.1 $e |- ( a = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
sbcies $p |- ( w = W -> ( [. ( E ` w ) / a ]. ps <-> ph ) ) $.
$d E a $.
$d W a $.
$d a ph $.
$d a w $.
